subject: CNN Alerts: bush
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Wu meets Bush on trade concerns 

05/24/07 11:06 PM, EDT
Chinese Vice Premier Wu Yi Thursday failed to ease President Bush's disappointment over at least one sticking point in U.S.-China relations and faced more complaints from Congress about Washington's huge trade deficit with Beijing.
FULL STORY
